long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basketball Serial Shooter is an exciting game available as a Chrome Extension. You can play this game for free on the website https://basketballlegends.net/. In "Basketball Serial Shooter," your goal is to showcase your shooting skills and accuracy on the basketball court. With each level, you'll face different challenges and obstacles that require precise shooting to score points. Aim carefully, adjust your angle and power, and release the ball to make the perfect shot. Challenge yourself to beat your high score and become a serial shooter legend. Whether you're a basketball enthusiast or simply looking for a fun and addictive game, "Basketball Serial Shooter" offers an entertaining experience that will keep you engaged. Get ready to show off your shooting prowess and aim for the highest score in "Basketball Serial Shooter"!
